name: CIV+5
startIntroPart1: Through strife and through glory, our society has endured… and now stands upon the foundation where all newborn nations take their first steps. United by a single purpose, we gaze upon the path that stretches open toward the future
startIntroPart2: Now… the age of civilization begins
declaringWar: We can no longer tolerate you. Prepare for war.
attacked: If it is war you want, then war you shall have.
defeated: So… this is the end of our people. May history remember us.
introduction: You stand before our nation. May our meeting be fruitful.
neutralHello: It is good to see you again.
neutralYes: This is agreeable. Let us seal the deal.
Very well. We accept your terms.
That is very good.
hateLetsHearIt: What are you trying to say?
hateNo: That is not possible!
We are not agreeing to that!
Never. We will not yield to such terms.
hateYes: Very well. For now, we agree.
afterPeace: Very well. We shall end this war.
tradeRequest: Consider this offer. It could serve us well.
uniques: [Gold] cost of purchasing items in cities [-50]%
[-25]% unhappiness from the number of cities
